records.name: Conrad Maldives Rangali Island

descriptions.direction: Located in Rangalifinolhu, Conrad Maldives Rangali Island is in the suburbs and on a private beach. Maafushivaru Island Jetty and Dhidhoofinolhu Marina are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, while those wishing to experience the area's natural beauty can explore Ari Atoll and Thun'di. Take an opportunity to explore the area for water adventures such as swimming and other activities like whale-watching.
descriptions.general: Reached by a 30-minute seaplane flight, Conrad Maldives Rangali Island offers three distinct resort experiences spanned across two private islands. Conrad Maldives Rangali Island offers families a rare opportunity to experience absolute privacy, comfort and freedom in its island paradise. Located on a secluded private island, the resort provides an option for island buy-out, with inclusions that can be customized to meet guest requirements and standards. The offer includes exclusive experiences and access to its luxurious villas, restaurants, wellness, and water sports facilities. Facilities and services include restaurants, bars, lounges, a wine cellar, an undersea restaurant, a spa, swimming pools, concierge services, babysitting services (extra charge), a kid's club, a fitness center, a 24-hour business center, dry cleaning/laundry services (extra charge), banquet facilities, meeting rooms, multilingual staff, and 24-hour room service. The resort also offers various diving and water sports upon request. Beach villas feature beach access, a living area, air conditioning, a fridge, flat-screen televisions, complimentary Wi-fi access, and a private bathroom. Water villas and suites feature a private pool, beach access, living area, air conditioning, fridge, flat-screen televisions, complimentary Wi-fi access, and a private bathroom. **Please note the following updates from the hotel: In case of choosing the option of all inclusive: The All Inclusive-concept includes all meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks) and mealtime drinks such as soft drinks, beer, wine, water and alcoholic drinks, all of local brands. Drinks are served from morning until late evening (approx until 22.00 -24.00 hrs). Opening times vary between different hotels. In certain hotels the activities program is also included. Please Note: Guests staying on December 31, 2025, a mandatory New Year’s Eve supplement applies, including the Gala Dinner at Atoll Market. Child Supplement Policy: For bookings between 21st December to 9th Jan 2025, children up to 05 years stay for free. Children between 06 and 11 years will be charged per child per night. Children 12 years and above will be charged as extra adults. Villa rates exclude seaplane charges. Villas on Rangali Island welcome guests 16 & above. The 2-Bedroom Rangali Ocean Pavilion accommodates families with children. Address: Rangali Island, Maldives 20077
